Rich,
Yes, more or less.  The founders of the major early Higo traditions are Hayashi Matashichi, Nishigaki Kanshiro, Shimizu Jingo(ro) and Hirata Hikozo.  

Jim



  Jim, study seems to place him in the same league of Umetada Myoju, Hayashi Shigeharund Shimizu Jingoro.

  Would this be correct ??

  Rich
